A deck of cards with illustrations of endangered species on each card. This would be a fun way to learn about and support conservation efforts while playing games.
A deck of cards with quotes from famous philosophers or authors on each card. Players could draw a card and use its quote as inspiration for their game play.
A deck of cards with photos of different landscapes around the world on each card. Players could try to match the photo with the correct location by flipping over cards.
A deck of cards with trivia questions related to history, science, or pop culture on each card. Players could take turns answering questions and earning points for correct answers.
A deck of cards with illustrated characters on each card that represent different personality traits or archetypes. Players could choose a character and use its traits to influence their game play.
